channel.title: I need very little help please come help me!
channel.description: i have ownagepkz source and dummys doors and hay bales give too much exp how i can change the exp?

item.title: I need very little help please come help me!
item.dc:creator: @mannac mannac
item.source: I need very little help please come help me!

item.title: I need very little help please come help me!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

All you need to do is find :

case 299:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage("A magic power in the hay raises up your defence skills");
addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(0x320);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

and

case 1531:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
	if(actionTimer == 0)
	{
		sendMessage("You start hitting the Door..");
		actionTimer = 20;
		setAnimation(0x326);
		addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[2]), 2);
		addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[3]), 3);
                addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18);
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
}
break;

and also

case 823:		
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You attack the dummy.");
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;

and then you change the bits of code as follows:

eg.
on the dummies , you would change :

addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18);

just edit the 70, 60 and 50, these are what multiply your level in that skill by the number…

well i hope that helps…

Read full topic
item.source: I need very little help please come help me!
